A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Walked out of the movie confused and then as time went on realised how much I hated it.  

TFA was all about finding a map that Luke had made to be able to then find Luke's island. TLJ was all about getting to the island and then Luke saying he didn't want anyone to find him??!  This is also the same Luke that could see the goodness in Darth Vader despite all the evil\, to then wanting to kill his own nephew after catching just a glimpse of some darkness in him.

This movie basically destroys all Luke's character from the previous movies. And how they treated Admiral Ackbar showed no regard for a 30 year old character.
